title: VR-Based Sepsis Management Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and patient care procedures
context.additional_context: Education for corporate health managers or learners in leadership roles, enhancing sepsis patient management competencies in VR simulations replicating real hospital environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify initial sepsis symptoms (fever, tachycardia, dyspnea, etc.) with 90% accuracy via VR simulation.
Learners achieve over 80% performance accuracy by applying sepsis protocols (blood culture, antibiotic administration, fluid therapy, etc.) step-by-step in a virtual environment.
After simulation, learners can self-diagnose two or more decision-making errors in sepsis management and propose improvement strategies through debriefing.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
